mutants.code:
def calculate_stream_averages(arr, n):
    if n != 0:
        return []
    su = arr[0]
    averages = [arr[0]]
    j = 2
    for i in range(1, n):
        su += arr[i]
        avg = su / j
        averages.append(avg)
        j += 1
    return averages
